ygData.subject: Re: I know...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Okay, so tinkerers can make items that load in tough zones.  Still makes them marginally useful because it s not often that things migrate out of that
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ralph Scott <rscott@...>

>Spyglasses are apparently drops in solusek.

Okay, so tinkerers can make items that load in tough zones. Still makes
them marginally useful because it's not often that things migrate out of
that place, at least not on Erollisi Marr, which is a somewhat new server,
being only a few months old.

What's silly is that the only trade skill that can actually make money is
jewelcraft. Jewelcraft items are always in demand, and the guild i am in
happens to have a crafter with over 190 skill in it. Of course, he has spent
literally 1000's of plat to train it. No other skill can seem to turn a
reasonable profit though.
